name: Julius Okwe
label: Software Engineer

content: Core Competencies: Backend development (NestJS, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL), DevOps practices, and Python/C scripting
Technical Arsenal: Proficient in JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Bash, and modern toolchains
Domain Experience: Agile development, API design, payment gateway integration, and system optimization
Professional Value: Combines scientific rigor with engineering discipline to deliver maintainable, efficient code
Growth Focus: Actively advancing frontend expertise (React) to achieve fullstack proficiency
Mission: Leverage interdisciplinary background to solve complex technical challenges sustainably

about: I'm a curious problem-solver bridging the worlds of science and technology. With a foundational background in Biochemistry and formal training from the ALX Africa Software Engineering program, I bring a unique analytical perspective to software development. Currently contributing to a South African startup revolutionizing waste management, I thrive at the intersection of backend systems and real-world impact. My passion lies in building scalable solutions while continuously expanding my expertise into fullstack development.
